Title: Relates to providing increased and uniform training requirements and outreach for law enforcement and establishes law enforcement peer support
Summary: Relates to providing increased and uniform training requirements including implicit bias, use of force, first aid and firearm training, and outreach for law enforcement; establishes law enforcement peer support through the office of mental health.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to providing increased and uniform training requirements and outreach for law enforcement; and to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to administering law enforcement peer support
